item.title: CVE-2023-37865|2024-06-05T13:52:14.889Z -- ip2location -- download%20ip2location%20country%20blocker
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in IP2Location Download IP2Location Country Blocker allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Download IP2Location Country Blocker: from n/a through 2.29.1.
